MarkedModModded:Acupuncture.NAME: Acupuncture
MarkedModModded:Acupuncture.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Needle to your hand.

MarkedModModded:FirstStrike.NAME: First Strike
MarkedModModded:FirstStrike.DESCRIPTION: If the target has no *Mark, Apply !M! *Mark. NL Exhaust.
MarkedModModded:FirstStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL If the target has no *Mark, Apply !M! *Mark. NL Exhaust.

MarkedModModded:GentlePulse.NAME: Gentle Pulse
MarkedModModded:GentlePulse.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL All enemies lose HP equal to their *Mark. NL Exhaust.
MarkedModModded:GentlePulse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL All enemies lose HP equal to their *Mark. NL Draw a card. NL Exhaust.

MarkedModModded:OneThousandNeedles.NAME: 1000 Needles
MarkedModModded:OneThousandNeedles.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! *Mark. NL All enemies lose HP equal to their *Mark. NL Whenever you Scry, return this from the discard pile to your hand.
MarkedModModded:OneThousandNeedles.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Refund !stslib:refund!. NL Apply !M! *Mark. NL All enemies lose HP equal to their *Mark. NL Whenever you Scry, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

MarkedModModded:PinPointDefense.NAME: Pin Point Defense
MarkedModModded:PinPointDefense.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked, apply 3 *Mark. NL Gain !M! Block whenever you apply *Mark.

MarkedModModded:GracefulMovements.NAME: Graceful Movements
MarkedModModded:GracefulMovements.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add !M! *Needle to your hand.
MarkedModModded:GracefulMovements.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add !M! *Needle to your hand.

MarkedModModded:SlowDance.NAME: Slow Dance
MarkedModModded:SlowDance.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, enter MarkedModModded:Dance_of_Death and Exhaust.
MarkedModModded:SlowDance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, enter MarkedModModded:Dance_of_Death.

MarkedModModded:NorthStar.NAME: North Star
MarkedModModded:NorthStar.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! *Mark X times to all enemies. NL All enemies lose HP equal to their *Mark X times. End your turn. NL Exhaust.
MarkedModModded:NorthStar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! *Mark X+1 times to all enemies. NL All enemies lose HP equal to their *Mark X+1 times. End your turn. NL Exhaust.

MarkedModModded:ChiBlock.NAME: Chi Block
MarkedModModded:ChiBlock.DESCRIPTION: Apply 12 *Mark. NL If the target has at least !M! *Mark, they are *Stunned. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The enemy doesn't have enough Mark.
